string-array.name: entries_for_error_code
string-array.item: Sleeve bag leaking or too slow to bump, can\'t reach 20mmHg in 10s
Sleeve bag pressure too high(larger than 295 mmHg)
Can\'t read diastolic pressure or not in typical value
Sleeve bag squeezing too fast.(faster than 15mmHg/s)
Sleeve bag squeezing too slow.(slower than 2mmHg/s)
